actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide that in civil actions where the United States is a plaintiff, a prevailing defendant may recover a reasonable attorney's fee and other reasonable litigation costs.

summary.text: Directs the United States to pay from current agency appropriations reasonable litigation costs, including attorney fees, to prevailing defendants in civil actions in which the United States is a plaintiff.

titles.title: A bill to provide that in civil actions where the United States is a plaintiff, a prevailing defendant may recover a reasonable attorney's fee and other reasonable litigation costs.
